駗駗駗

駗字的基本解释

駗
zhěn
〔駗驙〕马负重难行。

駗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhěn］
［《廣韻》章忍切，上軫，章。］
(1)见“駗驙”。
(2)马色。

駗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駗； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1436第14
【廣韻】章忍切【集韻】知忍切，?音辴。【玉篇】駗驙，馬載重難行。　又【集韻】知鄰切，音珍。義同。　又【廣韻】力珍切【集韻】離珍切，?音鱗。【廣韻】馬色。

駗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駗字的起名意思

暂无。

駗
Basic explanation of words
駗
zhěn
〔駗驙〕The horse can hardly carry a heavy load.
駗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhěn］
["Guangyun" Chapter Renqie, Shang Zhen, Chapter. ]
(1) See "駗驙".
(2) Horse color.
駗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駗; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1436 No. 14
[Guang Yun] Zhang Renqie [Jiyun] Knowing Renqie,? Sound. [Jade articles] Chaga, it is difficult for a horse to carry a heavy load.　[Jiyun] Knowing neighbors, Yinzhen. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Li Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Li Zhen cut,? Yin Lin. [Guang Yun] Horse color.
